X.T: Research: quantifying GitHub Copilotâ€™s impact on developer productivity and happiness
X.ST: When the GitHub Copilot Technical Preview launched just over one year ago, we wanted to know one thing: Is this tool helping developers? The GitHub Next team conducted research using a combination of surveys and experiments, which led us to expected and unexpected answers.

ARTICLE.COMMENT: A survey and an experiment demonstrating that developers using GitHub Copilot deliver faster, are more focused, and happier. But what about code quality?
